channel.title: Router stopped forwarding ports... (SOLVED)
channel.description:
Yup, was my firewall. I had to update it as well though for some reason.
This is not something MPSC related, I'm trying to do this to host my website. The problem is, the port is forwarded to my computer, yes. I'm starting to wonder, if it is possible that my Firewall is blocking stuff coming in from that port, but while I look into that, I am hoping to get more suggestions about what it could be. Here are 2 pictures so you know its port-forwarded to my comp.
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/10msbqc.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/dsorl.png[/img]
